alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:42AM EST until January 28 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Slippery travel and lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches of snow expected. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lake IN County. In Illinois, Southern Cook County. * WHEN...Through 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Conditions will be highly variable, potentially going from just flurries to reduced visibilities with accumulating snow over just a few mile stretch. Plan on snow covered roads impacting this mornings commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
